name: Transitly: AI-Powered Moving Assistant
description: Built intelligent moving assistant automating address changes across 10+ services (USPS, utilities, insurance, DMV, banks), reducing 6+ hours to 20 minutes.
Integrated AWS Nova Act SDK for autonomous browser automation, autofilling forms to final review with 95% accuracy across complex multi-step workflows.
Implemented real-time checklist tracking with OAuth authentication and DynamoDB persistence, managing state across 40+ individual tasks per user.
Deployed conversational AI chatbot with context-aware guidance and automated confirmation logging with calendar reminder integration.

name: TravelPlanner
description: Built AI-powered collaborative trip planner using LangGraph multi-agent orchestration coordinating 4 specialized agents with GPT-4 for group consensus.
Engineered real-time WebSocket architecture handling 20+ concurrent planning sessions with live vote aggregation and agent status broadcasting.
Implemented fairness tracking algorithm analyzing 100+ group decisions, ensuring no member compromises more than 30% above group average.
Integrated semantic embeddings with sentence-transformers generating context-aware activity recommendations from 10,000+ destination data points.

name: Music Recommendation System
description: Built hybrid recommendation engine processing 57,000+ songs and 1.6GB user interaction data, achieving 78% precision@10 for personalized suggestions.
Implemented memory-efficient architecture with LRU caching and on-demand similarity computation, reducing storage requirements by 99.9% (3.3B‚Üí3.3M values).
Developed NLP pipeline processing 200K+ song lyrics using TF-IDF vectorization and cosine similarity, handling stemming and stopword removal at scale.
Deployed interactive Streamlit app with YouTube API integration, serving recommendations with <2s response time for cold-start users.

name: Campus Marketplace
description: Built peer-to-peer marketplace serving 500+ university students with $50K+ in transaction volume, featuring real-time messaging and AWS S3 image storage.
Implemented JWT authentication with bcrypt hashing, rate limiting (100 req/min), and role-based admin dashboard for content moderation.
Developed real-time chat system with WebSockets handling 1,000+ daily messages, read receipts, and sub-second message delivery.
Designed MongoDB schemas with optimized indexes reducing average query time from 400ms to 45ms for product search and filtering.

name: CollabWatch
description: Built real-time video collaboration platform supporting 50+ concurrent users with sub-200ms latency using WebRTC peer-to-peer connections.
Implemented WebSocket-based signaling server with room management, handling connection negotiation and ICE candidate exchange for distributed video streams.
Deployed on AWS EC2 with Docker containerization, configuring TURN/STUN servers for NAT traversal and cross-network video streaming.
Developed synchronized playback controls with timestamp synchronization ensuring <100ms drift across all participants.

name: Reforestation Cost Analysis
description: Analyzed 15,000+ U.S. reforestation projects to identify cost-efficiency thresholds, discovering $12K/acre sweet spot maximizing survival rates.
Engineered 23 predictive features including soil composition, climate indices, and temporal variables, improving model R¬≤ from 0.43 to 0.78.
Implemented ensemble approach comparing Ridge, Lasso, and Random Forest models, achieving 15% lower RMSE than baseline linear regression.
Generated policy recommendations adopted by regional conservation groups for optimizing $2M+ in annual reforestation budgets.
